website_summaries.verdict: This kinetic sand will spark thoughts of the beach, and it provides an ample supply for lots of creative play.
pros: of soft sand that's easy to mold and holds shapes nicely
Includes tools to make a sandcastle with
cons: It comes with a sandbox, but it's flimsy

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love kinetic sand and the kids love it too! I've bought 3 different kits. One was an off brand and I don't recommend buying any off brands. This is a great deal. 3 pounds of sand is the perfect amount for a child to play with. I wouldn't want any less. The little sand castles are cute, but so far the kids don't care for the little shovels. Our favorite thing to do with the kinetic sand is combine it with little plastic construction trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Moment

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the set with an actual plastic case you can close to contain your sand and play in. It is not. It is a cardboard box with a bag of sand and mini sand castle tools. My daughter is enjoying it and I can put the sand in a baggy so it will work but I wish at the very least the box didn't have slits in the bottom where the sand can come through.
customer_reviews.author: Joe&Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This sand doesnʻt stick to anything except my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this and another kinetic sand product from the same company because I wanted an easy to clean option for sand play. It turns out that the sand sticks to my 3 year old - it got stuck on her hands, feet, legs & even her eyelid. And the worst thing was it didnʻt just brush off like regular sand . . . it wouldnʻt come off when I tried to wash it with soap and water. It took forever to get the kinetic sand off her & she ended up with a red rash from all of the rubbing that had to be done to remove it. NEVER AGAIN! What a rip off!!
customer_reviews.author: Mullins-Ibrahim Ohana

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun product. Not too steeply priced. The sand is really not messy it only sticks to itself and never seems to dry out which is a plus because you don't have to worry about putting it back in a bag or something. The Box you're supposed to play with it in is a little cheap but that's expected. You can always move it into something more sturdy like I did. Really fun I love this Product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Fish

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers, this product is fun and easy to clean. Three pounds is not actually very much sand so I had to buy two to fill a Tupperware, which was a bit expensive. This sand has a grainier texture than the colored kinetic sand you get in the little individual castles; I was hoping the softer texture of the colored sand, but this is still fun to play with. My 2 year old loves playing “sand”, building and smooshing castles, and pretending to dig for dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3lb not as much as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with little castle making molds which are fun but 3 lb was a lot less than I was expecting. I thought it was going to be a plastic beach scene container but it was just cardboard. Using for indoor sandbox play placed in a 32qt container. See picture. I've ordered 6 lb more to add to it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Sad Sand
customer_reviews.text: I'm super bummed about this box. My daughter has the colored sand and I LOVE IT so I decided with my ADD to get this box for myself and the sand isn't the same. It has all but hardened, I'm assuming they put too much product into the sand, and it doesn't have the same texture whatsoever. I called the kinetic sand company to see what they can do, (nice girl) but she basically told me that she could send me 2-3 4.5oz colored sands instead. This is THREE LBS. And the best I could get offered is not even 1 lb to replace it!? Smdh. Sure disappointed, and a waste of 20$ :(
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: My son enjoy this BUT can just get messy.....
customer_reviews.text: My son like this sand because he likes sand especially building a castle but my only complaint this can be all over the floor and can be messy but if that is NOT a big deal to you then this will be a good buy and also this is a good product especially because this is NONTOXIC which is very important to me for my son’s health. Therefore, I suggest to buy the one with the container that comes with it to contain the sand and that won’t break or can get wet because this cardboard didn’t really last with my son who tends to be hard on his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Clean With Liezl

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves this change of pace.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly relaxing toy for our 2 year old. He says, “I play sand.” It’s a nice change of pace from his other toys and he really enjoys playing with it. The one thing he doesn’t like is that there isn’t EVERYTHING that is on the box in the box. There isn’t a blue bucket or ball. I don’t think that’s false advertising but he takes it very literally. We found a $1 blue bucket at Target to use. He’ll play with it for anywhere from 30-45 mins at a time.
customer_reviews.author: WeTriedIt

customer_reviews.title: Hated this stuff !
customer_reviews.text: I get it isn't supposed to be wet but even before coming into contact with my daughters water table this stuff was awful. It's sticky and hard to clean off any surface, hands included. My 3 year old begged me for weeks for this sand, what a disappointment. I ended up tossing it and buying her play sand.
customer_reviews.author: NiNi

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (toddler) loves Kinetic Sand. We bought her a 1 lb kit prior to purchasing this 3 lb kit, and it's definitely made a better play experience for her (we combined the two). It's easy to clean up if it falls on the floor, and even on carpet. When it does fall on the floor, you'd clean it up like playdoh. If it gets really in the carpet, you can also vacuum it. It will stick to my daughter's hands at times (although it has never stuck to my or my SO's hands). Most of it comes off when she pats her hands, and then, of course, washing them with soap and water afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know who had more fun, me or my child. This is great for a bored child stuck inside (or any adult who’s a child at heart). This box had fun miniature sand castle toys with the sand. Nice solid plastic, no sharp edges plastic toys. The sand itself feels like a sandy melted marshmallow without the stickiness. It’s soft and relaxing to touch, feel, and play. Makes great sensory play as well. Easy to use, easy to set up. Just open the box and play right out of it. Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Wonder gift for my girls ages 2 and 5. I bought an extra 2 lb bag of pink kinetic sand, this way they don't have to share. This set came with enough little toys so they both can play separately. I wouldn't use the cardboard box this came in as the play area, I have a 9x13 metal pan I let them use. Easy clean up, needs no batteries, doesn't make noise. Excellent gift!!!!! The brown sand does have a little bit different texture than the pink but they are both great and is a nice change from play doh.
customer_reviews.author: RRach

customer_reviews.title: Sandtray Therapy Tested and Approved
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of this beach sand was a bit different then their other colors that I have purchased, but just as fun to play with for a therapeutic day at the beach. My kiddos and adults love the feel of the sand and enjoy playing in it. The extra sand tools are a nice compliment to the sand as is the beach backdrop scenery. I keep it in a blue rectangular container that represents the water. The sand cleans off the miniatures very easy. Great purchase and the price was right when I found it on sale for a therapist with a very minimal budget.
customer_reviews.author: FTCCE

customer_reviews.title: Three and a Half Y.O. Grandson Loves This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's great fun for my three and a half year old grandson! It's his new favorite thing to do. It's my favorite because it's so clean it can be played with in the house and it sticks to itself so you merely have to dab up the loose pieces with a glob of it - even on carpet! I have white carpeting under the table where he plays with it and it has not stained the carpet at all. Awesome fun for kids who love to play with gooey stuff or sand :) He plays with it for hours and it never dries out.
customer_reviews.author: Prepper

customer_reviews.title: Fun Non-Electronic Gift
customer_reviews.text: This brand of sand has been a crowd pleaser in our house for over a year now. I bought 3 for Christmas. It keeps the attention of an 8, 10, and even 12 year old very well. It is somewhat satisfying to play with, and it makes for very easy cleanup compared to slime which is a nightmare. I was skeptical of this product at first, but it is nothing like slime and I would recommend this to anyone for their kids to play with. Great rainy day activity, great for even in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Miles to Go Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Kinetic Sand
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift. Especially for indoor play in the winter. This sand is so fun to play with. We had hours of play. The best part easy clean up because it don't separate like regular sand. I had a blast playing with it with the kids. I will be buying more that how much fun this sand is. It never drys out so when the kids don't put it away no worries. If it falls on the floor grab some in your hand and collect it with the sand you have in your hand. It don't make messes like play doh.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old because she has been playing with her brothers old bag of kinetic sand. First of all 3 pounds is less than you would imagine, definitely don't buy a smaller set. Second, this sand feels more coarse than the old sand.... not sure why. But the set is super cute, nice to have to entertain the kids while stuck at home. I put it in a large shallow storage bin to try to keep the mess under control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sand without the mess! Kids loved it !!!
customer_reviews.text: This was another gift for a 9 year old . She was one happy kid , I was going to purchase it online and then checked amazon what a deal. This one was a great set for a great price . It came with a decent amount of sand and several different pieces to play with . Her 4 year old brother seemed to enjoy it as well. The packaging was great , the quality was there as well. The box is pretty heavy so I would say wrap it vs a gift bag .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Stimulates Creativity
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The sand provides hours of fun for children. The sand is very self adherent; non staining; easy to clean up when done; versatile and affordable. It stimulates creativity and quiet play. I would recommend 3 1/2 lb box for each child. One box of sand doesn’t provide a sufficient amount for two kids. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KD Murray, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: my kid likes it
customer_reviews.text: This has a small and manageable amount of sand; the container is the box itself. The sand is very easy to clean and manipulate. The forms come out very well to make the castle. Be advised, the pictures make it look like the forms are much bigger scale. This is a small box and small amount of sand. It can easily be expanded. Good table top activity while mom is making dinner.
customer_reviews.author: #1Docmom

customer_reviews.title: Really fun and an easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My son loves loves loves the beach and digging in his outdoor sand box. This is a nice makeshift alternative for the cold months. The sand sticks together so tiny particles don't get everywhere. We put ours in a very shallow plastic storage box so he can sit on the floor and play in it like a sand box. No mess, really. A little gets on the carpet and its easily picked up or vacuumed up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun - not messy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my 5 year old for Christmas and she really likes it. Not as much as I thought she would, but still likes it. She always loved playing in her sand table outside, so I thought this would be perfect for indoors during the colder months. I hate messes and was a little worried this would still be a mess, but boy was I surprised! This toy is probably one of the least messy things she received for Christmas. 😂 3 pounds is the perfect amount of sand for now and we fit it and all the pieces inside a small plastic storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2.5 and 5.5 year old granddaughters for Christmas. Their mother said it was the best gift they received as the girls will sit for over an hour at a time playing with it. Just a heads up, 3# of sand isn't really enough to do much. I bought some flat stacking plastic boxes with locking lids and put 6# in each box. I picked up a couple of sets of molds and tools and added them to a larger box that also stacked and locked. Cleanup is a cinch and there was no fighting over sand or tools/molds.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old likes it
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun to feel and play with. It comes with enough sand to fill the sand castle molds that it comes with because they are little. However I bought three extra pounds of beach sand which is shown in my photo. It cleans up easily and dusts off other toys easily as well. Our sculptures do sink in on themselves after a bit though, so that’s a little disappointing. Overall my daughter still likes it.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & fun, but use your own plastic storage container for easier storage and clean up
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and a 1/2 year old really likes this, I have caught myself playing with it too, I bought the brown sand and I find it's easier to clean up than another brand I bought. So far it has not dried out and I keep it in a large, shallow plastic storage container to keep it all together (like an indoor sandbox) and close the lid when we're not playing with it. I never used the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: JSP

customer_reviews.title: Good sub for classroom sand tables removed due to Covid!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was packaged well. My 4 yo loves it! They’ve done away with the sand tables in her classroom due to covid, so I wanted her to have this at home as a substitute of some sort. We used it for the first time this afternoon and BOTH of us had a blast. Highly recommend and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lildumplin

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: My son and the neighbor kids can not get enough of this sand. I have bought multiple packages over the years and keep a tiny “sand box” in the house for the kids to play with. It’s been worth every penny! They have gotten so much enjoyment out of it. It’s not messy. I have it in a shallow box with a snap on lid. But even if some gets on the floor or carpet, it clean up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: MGoans

customer_reviews.title: pricey for amount you get
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its just me, but I thought 3lbs of sand would be a little more than what it actually is. It is good sand and doesn't dry out and the kids love it. Its not quite enough for two kids though. I just think it is pricey for the amount you actually get. Its not just on amazon, even at Walmart the kinetic sand is just as expensive for not very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kinetic sand starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift to my 2 year old nephew, as well as a play dough set. Kids need sensory stuff and it's fun for mom. I just think this is awesome I ordered some things in addition to pimp it out and a rubbermade underbed storage tote so they could play in it and store it there. He loves it. His mom loves it. And so do older cousins. Kinetic sand is a huge win. And this is a great starter kit! The sand box included is adorable! Great buy. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Clean up is a breeze - kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical - sand in a box really? But its wonderful - easy to use, super easy to clean (the sand stays clumped together like play-do so you can use indoors and outside. We got for our 3 year old for Christmas and he loves building creations with it. A great teaching tool as well to work on hand eye coordination and creativity. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Hours of creative fun!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! We purchased two of the Kinetic Sand Beach Sets for my kids for Christmas, and they have been the most played with toy. The amount of sand it comes with is nice, the box doubles as a play space and storage, and the shovels and sand molds allows you to play and create so many things. We have had no issues at all with it drying out, and it holds shapes quite nicely. Very happy we got this set. It has been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My almost two year old and four year old love this stuff! They will play with it for hours, and fight over it lol. And it’s easy to clean up and doesn’t leave a mess. They play with it right in the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: JessLV

customer_reviews.title: Better than play dough!
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff. It doesn’t stick to your hands or do anything else and doesn’t make a huge mess. Better than Play doh or slime. And the best thing it doesn’t dry out! Easy cleanup if it does fall on the floor or get on anything. Also great for us since we don’t live near a beach, so it’s great being able to bring some of the beach experience into our home! A generous amount is included (enough for two kids to play,) but we’re going to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bain

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: my son loves his sand! i bought a little container for it with a lid so he can use it a little better! the box converts into a container for it but its not all that great. a cheap dollar store container worked perfect! it still has its "wow" factor after a while of him playing with it! honestly. im a little fascinated with it! its really neat. He has requested more! i love how there is more colors at affordable prices. the little tools that come with it make it even more fun! my little guy will sit for a while and play with his sand. (4 years old)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’a third birthday and he loves it. The sand does not dry out, but I still put it in a plastic bag and it is so easy to clean up. This also comes with a lot of sand which is great for me to split between my 3 kids. The only thing I can say is to buy a separate tub to play with this. I purchased an inflatable one and it has all the room for them to play without getting a mess everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Carleah Doan

customer_reviews.title: Cute play set
customer_reviews.text: Cute play set. The box can be folded and used as a tray, which is convenient. The only issue I see with that is the sides come up about 2-3 inches, so little arms and hands might have trouble with that, at least seated at table height. But then a baking sheet or mat would suffice. The sand doesn’t dry out, and doesn’t get all over the place. I don’t know how it works, but it’s mesmerizing! Good relaxation for adults, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for inside sand play
customer_reviews.text: Great value,and great for preschoolers and school age children for inside sand play. Easy to clean up sticks to itself! Comes with utensils to dig,and build sand blocks. Grandson plays with his dinosaurs in the included box with the sand. Bought 2 so he can double the sand or his brother can play at the same time. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mawmaw 6

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this thing was gonna be pretty stupid, but after giving it to a friend there were like 6 different kids fighting to play with it. It cleans up pretty well and the box doubles as a sand holder! The sand comes out of the molds really well so you get a pretty sweet castle too.
customer_reviews.author: By samuel thompson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for your kid not mine
customer_reviews.text: Idk, i never had this and as a kid idk if i ever wanted this. Please give them to your kids not as a bday present. Its annoying to clean sand
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Hours and hours of fun! My 5 year old loves it. It comes with several tools to use but my daughter also uses her play doh accessories with it and it’s even more fun. Would recommend putting some plastic or newspaper down for easier clean up but on the whole it isn’t too bad at clean up time. Not going to lie, it’s relaxing for adults too so take a minute an play with your kids, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina corral

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sensory play
customer_reviews.text: My boys absolutely love this sand. It can get a little messy, but it is easy to sweep up the little pieces that get left behind. I don’t know about carpet, I always have them do it at the kitchen table where there is no carpet lol doesn’t dry out and is so fun! This kit has lots of cool additions to it they love as well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitnee

customer_reviews.title: It's fun but messy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my six-year-old as a Christmas gift since that's what she was on her list. She had lots of fun with it but it doesn't come in a container to put it away and it gets all over the place. My best advice is to find a container to put it away and also have a designated area for them to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: martha reyes

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE KINETIC SAND! We bought this for our almost three year old for Christmas and mom and dad can’t stop playing with it. It’s something we all do at the table together and it’s so fun! We even bought more colors just a couple of days after opening and playing with it! We can’t bring ourselves to buy the other brands because we are too scared we’ll be let down! It’s easy to pick up, we bought a plastic storage container to keep it in that we can easily pull out and just pop off the lid and start playing!
customer_reviews.author: Kody Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about this toy. I thought it would be messy and my sone would not enjoy playing with it. We got this for his thrid birthday. It is easy to play with and clean up. He has spent hours playing with it. We write letters in the sand and hide objects. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr old loves it for its many play possibilities and I like the easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: This is a super invention/product for kids. Not messy, moldable, soft fun. My 2 yr old grandson plays for a long time with this. He uses the molds but also fills his trucks with it so they have a load. Lol when it’s time to clean up it easily comes out of the trucks nooks and crannies and off whatever surface he’s dropped clumps on. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Fun product, but less sand than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: FYI this amount of sand works best when used in a container the size of a shoe box. We store in a tupperware container that size, with an airtight lid. Playing with the sand inside the box it comes in, as intended, seems like it would make for a big mess, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This just kept my 5 year old busy for a the past hour. The fun of a sandbox without the big expense or mess. I purchased a separate shallow plastic tote with lid for storage/play and it works quite nicely. This is a great sensory activity and would make a great gift at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ljp143

customer_reviews.title: Keeping kids busy for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson who just turned 3. It keeps him busy for a long while. Some of my older kids join him, ages 12 & 5. We placed it into a large, long and shorter bin, gave them some mini sand toys and they play for hours. Easy to care for, and use too.
customer_reviews.author: Ambitious Mama

customer_reviews.title: KINETIC SAND
customer_reviews.text: This is the neatest coolest stuff I've seen had fun with greatgrand son playing with this sand amazing how it sticks together and best of all no mess great product
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Capel

customer_reviews.title: Love Kinetic Sand - be aware of size.
customer_reviews.text: The sand is the best indoor sand- easy clean up, fun to play! The tools that come with it are mini or kid sized - think a Barbie castle. I’m not sure that you can make the castle pictured with the amount of sand in the package but it’s still a good purchase. I’d buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: House of Cats

customer_reviews.title: Fun and amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean up, it sticks to itself (kind of like playdoh). My son was obsessed for months, and like everything it got dingy after awhile. My recommendation, get a separate box from this cardboard one and make sure you don't get the sand wet, there's no coming back if you do. However, lots of fun for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline L.

customer_reviews.title: So sticky and hard to clean!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriends rave about kinetic sand for their kids but after buying this I have to say it’s not for my family! The sand is so stubborn to remove from hands or anywhere else the kids get it. The only thing I found that works is DISH soap and a course towel. I like how malleable the sand is but it’s simple not worth the absolute nightmare it is to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: "starvingartiste7"

customer_reviews.title: A Huge Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loved this!! I store it in a Tupperware container and take it with us when we go to her sister’s cheer practice several times a week. She has so much fun building sand castles and it always attracts lots of attention from the other kids. Since it’s magnetic, if some is spilled outside the container it’s easy to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Family

customer_reviews.title: Mind Blown
customer_reviews.text: WHAT IS THIS AND HOW HAVE I NEVER HEARD ABOUT IT?! I ordered some to have a few indoor play options as ice season starts and we opened it about two hours ago. I’ve already ordered another one. My two and a half year old and I are in love with it. This package is particularly cool as it comes with the little building toys.
customer_reviews.author: M Turlo

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine motor development!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! My 3yr old son has fine motor delays and Kinetic sand was recommended by his OT. He loves playing with this and it's so easy to clean up! And at the same time, helps strengthen his hand muscles. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: JenneFromDaBlock

customer_reviews.title: Good godt
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas and forgot to review. It was on major sale for Black Friday so I picked it up as a filler gift or in case I forgot someone but o ended up giving it to my kids. They love it. Easier to clean up that regular sand and cones with cute toys. There is enough in the box for two of them to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alston

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it. A great hands on toy
customer_reviews.text: I have never played with this stuff before but thought I would try it out for a gift for my 6 year old. Wish I would have bought it years ago. It's really fun to play with. My kids and myself and husband like playing with it lol I've wasted so much money on Play-Doh and this kept my kids entertained for awhile unlike Play-Doh does. And I like that it never dries out. I plan to buy more colors and tools for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Weird texture but my kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beach sand kinetic sand, it definitely isn't the same as the ultra fine kinetic sand. It feels weird, like someone took beach sand & dumped some glue in it. You can see the "goo" when you pull it apart. You can see the fibers of it. My kid loves it, I personally struggle with the way it feels. It is exactly what is shown. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean, and store.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have used kinetic sand before, but this comes with sand castle building stuff! And a box to play in and store it all! We have had this a month, and I have made some cool casles myself, so fun! And it all stays in the box and we store it all on a toy shelf. Easy to use, fun to use. Perfect for young and older kids, and an adult like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great play experience.
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this set. It's easy to encourage children to use the sand in the box since it looks like the beach. Younger children liked using the tools and older children liked the molds. We've been able to clean up the sand quickly when we're done. We bought 4 boxes when they were on sale and I would gift another box if I had more. My only disappointment was that some of the boxes were "dented" during shipment. Since the box remains part of the play experience it would have been better if there was no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Gunu

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as one of her birthday gifts. She just loves playing and making molds. She spent an hour and a half the first time playing with it. All you have to say is sand and she gets excited to play with it. Purchased another 3 pounds of sand. Worth all the smiles and giggles she has playing with Kinetic Sand.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: I’m the Grandma but I loved playing with it!!
customer_reviews.text: This sand is so fun!! I love that it’s not messy! I gave this to my grandkids but I loved playing with it. I love how they make the box the scenery and it’s set up to play with the sand inside it. An extra help to keep it clean while having fun!!
customer_reviews.author: LTR

customer_reviews.title: fun to play with and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'll ever but play dough again! This sand was so easy to clean and vacuums up like a breeze! My 3 year old had it out for 3 hours, playing with it off and on and it never dried up! doesn't stick to your hands and is so easy to play with!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Mom Approved.
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves this sand. It’s easy to mold, and easy to clean. Although I got an entire sand table, my kids continue to bring it on carpeted areas, and it doesn’t mush into my carpet. It comes right out. Unlike that slim stuff. So this product gets a definite 10/10 from this momma! I already purchased more so my kids don’t fight over it.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I love giving this as a gift to the kids. So much you can do with this and the imagination is so creative. I usually pair this with a small construction set and they have a blast with it. I would recommend this item and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri H.

customer_reviews.title: my girl loves it
customer_reviews.text: this is a gift from my brother to my 5 year old, actually my girl she asked for it lols. we got a day after we ordered it i didn't expect how quick the deliver is. She loves it morning and night she love to play with it. She can entertain herself with it.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy J

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted! It feels great, doesn’t leave a mess, and very easy to clean up! The box turns into a little beach scene. The tools are perfect too. Highly recommend if you are looking to order kinematic sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Sand Sand Sand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to keep busy with during the COVID19 and was very disappointed. About a week after delivery when we went to open the package, we noticed the bag with the sand is open, sand everywhere and honestly it feels like just regular sand. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sinem

customer_reviews.title: very oily, once touch the floor, it becomes extremely slippery
customer_reviews.text: very oily, once touch the floor, it becomes extremely slippery, fall hazard!
customer_reviews.author: Qing Mu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my little!
customer_reviews.text: My little loves to play with play dough but it always dries up so easily when she doesnt put the covers on correctly. I love that this is easy to play with. Can be molded into anything and does not dry out!! I know that when my little can take care of it when she is done playing and I dont have to worry about it drying out!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bring the beach to your home!
customer_reviews.text: This sand is so much fun for kids and adults alike. The only issue is that when the kids play with it all the time, you end up finding kinetic sand EVERYWHERE. It’s a really neat product though, so I would 100% get it again.
customer_reviews.author: KBuzz

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My kids love Play-Doh, but I don’t like the clean up with it. Kinetic sand comes up so easily, even from the carpet. My 4 year olds and my 1 year old all enjoy playing with this. I will definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmom15

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson for his third birthday. I am delighted to say that he plays with the sand for long periods of time. He is creative in his thinking so he finds many uses for it such as building castles and digging for dinosaurs. He likes the product so much that Santa is giving him more for Christmas. Wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: 3lbs is not as much as you'd think but it's still fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old enjoys playing with this more than play doh. It's pretty easy to clean up and he enjoys having the tools to build things. He also has small toy trucks he likes to bury in the sand. We keep the sand in a 1 gallon ziplock back and it fills 1/2 of it (to give you an idea of how much 3lb is).
customer_reviews.author: V. Verruto

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old love love loves this! We had so much fun adding his little plastic dinosaurs and building castles. It is hard to break it to a preschooler that the castle you build will not look like the one of the box. You stack 2 shapes together and the sand crumbles from the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amr

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is really high quality product. I bought it for the grandkids to play with after hearing several saying how much they enjoyed playing with it at other locations. Every parent says this product is far superior to the kinetic sand they have used elsewhere. First class!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! But smelly!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product although it does have a strong unpleasant smell to it (like epoxy almost) it does fade or we are just used to the smell now. Lol but my son has been begging to go play in his sand box and our weather hasn’t been ideal for that so now he has a sand box in the house he loves it!!! Also I did order an additional 3lb bag of sand when compressed together it doesn’t seem like much but spread out the 6lbs total is plenty for him and I to play together with
customer_reviews.author: cecilia simmons

customer_reviews.title: Easy and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to clean and worth the money. I love the texture and how easily my child plays with it. Do not order an off brand, or you'll regret it. Order the original. The off brands don't stick, are messy and not easy to play with in a house.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: My grandson asks for it as soon as he comes through the door.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's really not messy. If it gets on my throw drugs I just pick it off easily or shake it out side. Doesn't stick to your hands or anything for that matter. Even my 2 year old grandson thought it would stick to his hands and he just looked at his hands and was amazed. Asks for it as soon as he comes through the door. He puts it in his dump truck or the little trailer that goes behind it or he puts it in a mold and makes things. Keeps him busy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old niece and nephew love this and so does their 8 year old sister. It's nice to have the beach inside when the weather is bad outside, and it's much less messy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beach fun without the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Kinetic sand is great for wanting to play in the sand without going to the beach! I bought it for my daughter who broke her leg, and it keeps her entertained. Easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING- Best money I've spent in a while!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE! This stuff is absolutely amazing- my boys, 7 and 10, both enjoyed playing with it and I enjoyed the lack of a mess. The only way I can think of to describe this is like a slime/sand combo, but without the sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Dwenger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo loves the beach and sand! I will be ordering another box for my 4 yo. The boys sit at the table and play w this... great for when I need to clean the kitchen or make dinner! They used a lot of their play dough toys with it. So I wouldn’t splurge on the kits that come w all the plastic pieces unless you don’t have something like that. But they love using measuring cups or small buckets or even making “truck tracks”
customer_reviews.author: mara

customer_reviews.title: Fun Sensory Play
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of my daughters favorite activities. I just keep it stored in a small plastic bin with lid. My preschooler will sit at the table and play in the “sand box” for at least 20 minutes completely engaged. I know some people even add small figurines to add more interest. I just use the toys that came with the sand and that’s enough for my daughter. Love this sensory activity, would highly recommend for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Huge let down.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a little container at Walmart to test it out before the 3 lbs bags I ordered got here. It’s so hard to clean off. It stuck to my kids hands and arms. It feels like baby oil mixed with sand. You’re better off with regular sand that dries and dusts off. When I did vacuum (what ever spilled) off my floor, it left a slippery residue that wouldn’t come off even with cleaner. I will be returning the 3lbs bags I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff is amazing! Way cooler than playdoh and soo easy to clean up. Have had it open since december and it is now April and the consistency is still the same. Hasn’t dried out at all. We do put it in a ziplock bag after each use but it is played with at least 3 days a week... and clean up is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Ris

customer_reviews.title: Nice playset.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was perfect. This is a good amount of play sand to begin with, and the toys included are cute and usable. My son enjoys building mini sand castles anytime he wants! He plays in the kitchen floor, and whatever is left after playtime I just sweep up. He has the Kinetic Sand Sandbox set as well and stores everything in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Children Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as Christmas gifts for kids aged 4, and 8. They loved it! Spent hours building sand castles. However, there is not enough sand in one kit to build a cover like the castle shows. You need to buy extra sand.
customer_reviews.author: book_reader1

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun as a family. Kids ask to play with it every day. It is soft and feels like real sand. The only problem is it gets everywhere and can be a mess to clean up if playing on the carpet. We use the large play pad as seen in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TranPhamily

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to keep kids busy, without making a mess. They can play indoors or outdoors with it. We have 3 boxes of the sand, so that there's plenty to allow room for creativity.
customer_reviews.author: RefLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love our kenetic sand! I was worried that it was gonna be messy and it is a little bit the clean up is SO easy! The sand only sticks to itself so it’s nice! A great buy! The sand toys are sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Jani

customer_reviews.title: Good sand. No storage.
customer_reviews.text: The kinetic sand is good and the “beach” box is fine to play with. My issue is there’s nothing to put the sand in after you open the box unless you’re careful with the box. My kids were not.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Great, but sand does dry out if not stored in a plastic bag
customer_reviews.author: AK62517

customer_reviews.title: Fun inside or outside
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with and easy to clean-up. Because the sand sticks together you don’t have to worry about sand everywhere. I let my kids play with this inside the house in the box.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom123

customer_reviews.title: Kept my toddlers busy for almost an hour!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe it kept my 2yr old and 1 yr old entertained for almost a solid hour. Definitely recommend getting sand accessories to play with. They loved cutting it and building with it.
customer_reviews.author: KristinF

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard finding gifts for my 8 year old and 2 year old to share but this was perfect! Kept them both entertained for hours. Plus it doesnt leave that sticky residue like PlahDoh 👌👌
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old and put it in a small rubber made container so she could play with it in the bin. She loves the way it feels and I love it because there isn’t sand all over since it sticks. The little sand toys are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mhart

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kinetic sand. It is definitely worth the extra money to buy the original product and not the knock offs. This sand is very easy to clean up and has a unique texture that, in my opinion ,much nicer than the off brand products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be very against kinetic sand until someone bought some for my girls. This set and the sand are awesome. Much easier to clean than play-doh, and it keeps my girls occupied for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

product_meta.title: Kinetic Sand Beach Sand Kingdom Playset with 3lbs of Beach Sand, for Ages 3 and Up
product_meta.description: Build amazing sandcastles anywhere with the award winning Kinetic Sand Beach Sand Kingdom! The Beach Sand Kingdom playset includes 3lbs of Kinetic Beach Sand and everything you need to build real sandcastles! Different from the smooth feel of classic Kinetic Sand, Kinetic Beach Sand is made with larger grains of natural sand and feels just like wet beach sand! It easily molds and never dries out, so you can build again and again! Use the 6 castle-themed molds to build your sandcastles and create towers, walls, bridges and more! The 2 multi-use tools can be used to cut, dig, rake and shovel your Kinetic Beach Sand! Unfold the box to reveal a beachy play space and create sandcastles anywhere! When you’re finished building sandcastles for the day, clean-up is easy. Gather your Kinetic Beach Sand into a large ball and use it to pick up smaller bits of sand, then pack everything away into the box until next time. Bring the fun of the beach home and build your own sandcastles with the Kinetic Sand Beach Sand Kingdom!
feature_bullets: FEELS LIKE WET BEACH SAND: Kinetic Sand Beach Sand feels like wet beach sand that’s actually dry! It magically flows through your hands without sticking. It’s easy to shape and mold and cleans up easily! Like all Kinetic Sand products, Kinetic Beach Sand is wheat, gluten and casein free

3LBS OF BEACH SAND: The Beach Sand Kingdom comes with 3lbs of Kinetic Beach Sand, so you can build your own sandcastles again and again! Plus, the packaging doubles as a beach themed play space! When you’re finished playing, pack the Kinetic Beach Sand, molds and tools away until next time

8 CASTLE THEMED MOLDS and TOOLS: The Beach Sand Kingdom includes everything you need to create epic sandcastles anywhere! Use the 6 castle themed molds to create walls, bridges, towers and more. The 2 multi use tools can be used to cut, dig, rake and shovel Kinetic Beach Sand

The Kinetic Sand Beach Sand Kingdom is a 2018 PAL Award Winner, being recognized for promoting play that advances language in children, and winner of the Good Housekeeping Best Toy Awards, and Parents’ Choice Fun Stuff Award. The Beach Sand Kingdom is perfect for creative and imaginative play for kids aged 3 and up
Includes: 3 pounds (1.36 kg) Kinetic Sand Beach Sand, 6 Molds, 2 Tools, 1 Transformable Sand Box, 1 Instruction Guid

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,195 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
